scripts.build: rm -rf build && docker run --platform=linux/amd64 --rm -v "$PWD":/app -w /app node:20 bash -lc 'npm ci && npx -y esbuild src/index.js --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --target=node20 --outfile=build/index.cjs && node --experimental-sea-config sea-config.json && cp $(command -v node) build/lums && npx -y postject build/lums NODE_SEA_BLOB build/sea-prep.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2 && chmod +x build/lums'
